post:
ScarabWeb offers a wide range of different products from $1.95/month Web Hosting up to Full Managed Enterprise Private Cloud products. all to a very affordable prices. We own our equipment and are located in a Tier IV Datacenter (IRS1075/PCI/SAS70/HIPAA/SOC1 (SSAE16) / SOC2 Type 2 audited).
We are connected throuhg redundant Gig and 10Gig uplinks to 8 carriers (US Signal, Level3, Global Crossing, XO, TW Telecom, TW Cable, HE, Cogent)

Test IP: 199.114.216.131
Test Download: www.scarabweb.com/100mb.bin

24/7 Online: Visit our website today and speak to a sales representative we are online 24/7 including livechat, email, and ticket support at www.scarabweb.com, or give us a call at (800) 653-0943.


[* Reasons to choose ScarabWeb.com * ]​
(*) 100% Power and Network uptime!
(*) 24/7 Sales and Support!
(*) Microsoft SPLA Partner
(*) Custom and Bulk orders available
(*) Private Cloud ready Dedicated Servers available (with up to 4x10Gbits network ports for SAN and Network access)
(*) Private Cloud ready SAN optional available (contact us for SAN quotes)


(*) When you order any of our VPS servers and pay monthly you will receive 50% Off the first invoice and second month free use coupon 2011DEC50OFF or pay on any other billing cycle and receive 25% OFF the first invoice and one free month use coupon 2011DEC25OFF
